Package ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize

Class OptimalScheduleFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.domains.sdf.optimize.OptimalScheduleFinder
  • public class OptimalScheduleFinder
extends java.lang.Object

    Class comments

    An OptimalScheduleFinder encapsulates an algorithm to find an optimized schedule. In particular it implements a simple state space exploration algorithm to find a minimum buffer size schedule.

    See OptimizingSDFDirector, OptimizingSDFScheduler and BufferingProfile for more information.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Marc Geilen
    See Also:
    OptimizingSDFDirector, OptimizingSDFScheduler, BufferingProfile
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red ()
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (mgeilen)
